com.siperian.sif.message.metadata

Class MetaDataTableColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataBase
      • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataColumnBase
        • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataTableColumn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable

    public class MetaDataTableColumn
extends MetaDataColumnBase
    Represents metadata about the column of a table, package, or remote package.
    See Also:
    DescribeSiperianObjectRequest, Serialized Form

    API Group: Metadata

      • setDataDefault

        public void setDataDefault(String dataDefault)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the default data value for the column.
        Parameters:
        dataDefault - The default data value for the column.

      • getDataDefault

        public String getDataDefault()
        Get the default value for the column. If no value is specified for this column when creating a new record, the default value will be used.
        Returns:
        The default value for the column.

      • setDataLength

        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the length of the data.
        Parameters:
        dataLength - The length of the data.

        Parameters:

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Determine whether this column is visible.
        Returns:
        true if this column is visible, false otherwise.

        public void setDisplayLength(int displayLength)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the display length.
        Parameters:
        displayLength - The length of the display of this column.

      • getDisplayLength

        public int getDisplayLength()
        Get the display length for the column. This is how large the field representing this column should be when displayed.
        Returns:
        The length of the display of this column.

        public void setNullable(boolean nullable)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set whether this column is nullable.
        Parameters:
        nullable - Whether this column is nullable.

      • isNullable

        public boolean isNullable()
        Determine whether this column is permitted to contain a NULL value.
        Returns:
        true if this column is nullable, false otherwise.

        Get the UID of the lookup column associated with this table column.

        The UID of the lookup column associated with this table column.

      • isLookup

        Returns:

      • setUnique

        public void setUnique(boolean unique)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set whether this is a unique column.
        Parameters:
        unique - Whether this is a unique column.

      • isUnique

        public boolean isUnique()
        Determine whether this is a unique column. Unique columns may not contain the same value as any existing record in the owning table.
        Returns:
        true this is a unique column, false otherwise.

      • setParentColumnUid

        public void setParentColumnUid(String parentColumnUid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the parent column's UID.
        Parameters:
        parentColumnUid - The parent column's UID.

      • getParentColumnUid

        public String getParentColumnUid()
        Get the UID of this column's parent column. This applied in the case of packages and remote packages. The value returned is the UID of the column in the parent table.
        Returns:
        The UID of the parent column.

      • setKeyCol

        public void setKeyCol(boolean keyCol)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set whether this is a key column.
        Parameters:
        keyCol - Whether this is a key column.

      • isKeyCol

        public boolean isKeyCol()
        Determine whether this is a key column. Key columns are part of the primary key of the table.
        Returns:
        true if this is a key column, false otherwise.

        readOnly - Whether this is a read-only column.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • isGBID

        public boolean isGBID()
        Determine whether this column represents a GBID (Global Business Identifier). Typically a GBID column contains an external key that is not generated by the Hub Server.
        Returns:
        true if this column is used as a GBID, false otherwise.

      • setGBID

        public void setGBID(boolean gbid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response.
        Parameters:
        gbid - The GBID to set.
